value.title: Across China: Speech recognition software helps Tibetans better communicate
value.excerpt: What helped them conquer the language barrier is a speech recognition app on the smartphone that can convert the three main Tibetan dialects -- U-Tsang, Amdo, Kamba -- to texts and translate them into Chinese.

value.title: GPT-3 the breakthrough on AI and natural language.
